Invocation Name: my oven
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill helps you to control and monitor the most important programs and functions of your oven with your voice.

Features:
* Use your oven in Alexa routines to turn it on, off or start a program (turning the oven on will start the default program)
* Start many heating modes including microwave, grill, pizza and keep warm (availability depends on your oven model)
* Start your Home Connect favorite oven programs (favorites need to be set before in the Home Connect app).
* Change easily the temperature or duration
* Support of meat thermometer
* Ask for the temperature and duration status
* Open the door or monitor your food without opening the oven (availability depends on your oven model)
* Start the oven without specifying all the settings and Alexa will use the default settings
* Support of several ovens with one skill and of ovens with multi-compartment or double ovens
* Support with visual content and touch interaction on Echo Show devices

Selection of supported commands:
"Alexa, tell My Oven to start"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to start fast preheat"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to start a Bake program"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to start Bake for 10 minutes"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to start Bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to start microwave at 600 watt for 2 minutes"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to start my favorite program"
"Alexa, ask My Oven about my favorites"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to decrease the temperature"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to add ten degrees"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to add ten minutes"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to increase duration by 30 min"
"Alexa, ask My Oven for the status"
"Alexa, ask My Oven when dinner is ready"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to stop"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to stop beeping"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to open the door"
"Alexa, tell My Oven to show me my food"
"Alexa, tell My Oven Number Two* to start"
"Alexa, tell My Oven Oliver* to start"
"Alexa, tell My Oven Top* to start"

*Please define the oven name in the Home Connect app.

Shorter commands for Alexa Smart Home:
"Alexa, turn on Oven"
"Alexa, turn off Oven"
* Use the name you chose for your oven in the Alexa app

Further tips:
* In order to use this skill, register first in the Home Connect app and afterwards link your Home Connect account with Alexa. Make sure your oven is also connected to the Home Connect app.
* Make sure remote start is activated on your oven to use this skill.
* When you have multiple ovens, you need to say your oven's name together with "my oven". For example, if your oven is named "Oliver" in the Home Connect app, you should say "Alexa, tell My Oven Oliver to start". For shorter 'Smart Home' commands, you can just use your oven's name without 'my oven'.
* If Alexa can't understand your oven names try renaming your main oven to "Oven" and your others with numbers. For example, name your ovens "Oven", "Oven Number Two", and "Oven Number Three" in the Home Connect app.
* The synchronization of the favorite programs may take some time, to see them immediately, please delete the virtual oven from your Alexa app and ask "Alexa, discover devices".
* If you have any problems with your skill, please try to reactivate it.

Please be aware that the skill might not support all home appliance features as available in the Home Connect app. We are continuously working on new version releases to improve and enrich the skill experience.
